title: 590. Young QBs Having Success Early In Their Careers
itunes:title: 590. Young QBs Having Success Early In Their Careers
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a special new episode. To start off, the guys discuss how young quarterbacks are having success early in their pro careers and if teams are changing what they're looking for after the emergence of quarterbacks like Patrick Mahomes and Lamar Jackson, who play each other on Monday Night Football (1:09). Next, the duo focus on Jaguars QB Gardner Minshew and the pieces around him (9:43). After that, DJ talks about some of the top rookies he's been watching and Bucky reacts (13:56). To wrap up the show, the pair look at 0-2 teams that had expectations and discuss which ones they are most concerned about (23:47).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
